碼.definition: weight; number; code; to pile; to stack; classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

碼子.definition: (coll.) numeral; counter; chip; token; (old) ready money; cash; standard weight (used on a balance scale)

碼字.definition: to type (with a keyboard); (coding theory) codeword

碼放.definition: to pile up; to stack up

碼洋.definition: (publishing industry) total cover price of all books in an edition
